title: Banning a Player From Being in Your Team (Survey)
body:
Okay so i posted a threat about this a about 4 or 5 days ago, however gathering any sort of idea or data on where people stood was too {{summoner:3}} ing. Keep in mind i'm not wanting this feature implemented so i can just make every single person i don't like banned from being on my team, this is entirely aimed at removing AFK people, and trolls.


Before voting please consider the pro's and con's of what this feature could bring. I love the idea of the feature, but even i know and can see many flaws in it, so i'm still undecided if we should implement it, but getting everyone to vote is allows for some exposure to the idea so please up this thread :)


**Pro's**
Won't be paired with someone you have a huge disagreement with.
Less Trolls.
Can avoid double losses due to one person.

**Cons**
Long queue times
Potentially abusable 
Can Essentially remove all bad players from your game (Pro or Con?)


There is quite obviously many many more factors to take in, but i felt these were the most prominent. I also think that this is something that should have some restriction added too it, for example;

Only in ranked
Certain # per day ( Avoids retards just getting rid of everyone who had a bad game, and focuses on **AFK** people and **TROLLS** )
Can only ban them from results at the end of the game (Similar to honour)
Must be on your team.

replies.body: Yes, consideration. However, OCE low size could be a problem here too, unfortunately.
Sadly i agree but i feel it's worth a thought. {{summoner:2}}
Something like this is as a possibility would be good though, and if OCE's low size was a problem there could be a stunted version of this? Like, highly unlikely to be matched with? Haha.
Yeah, that could be a good feature too

>Pro's
>Won't be paired with someone you have a huge disagreement with.

Wait out of queue, is it really that hard?

>Less Trolls.

Not really, there will always be the same amount of trolls.

>Can avoid double losses due to one person.

Again wait out of queue.

If your in queue with the same person twice that is **YOUR** fault

I guarantee you riot does not support their players having to wait 2-3mins just so they don't have to play with a particular person

Not to to mention if you're someone who plays on off-peak, it's gonna be 5+ mins and their should be no need for that at all, your comment is just arrogant and you clearly didn't read the original post.
Is it really that hard to get off your ass, get a drink or something then sit back down and queue?
Why should I have too if I don't have too, just wasting time...
Why should riot implement something that you yourself can implement with 2 minutes of your time?
Back a couple of years ago while playing on EUW this is essentially how I was told Ignoring a player worked after the match was over, that you'd never see them on your team again.
